businessProfile.name: Mountain Mike's Pizza
businessProfile.address: 41 W University Pkwy, Orem, UT 84058, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 41 W University Pkwy, Orem, UT 84058, USA

reviews.text: Haven't had mountain mikes since highschool out near Sacramento. I was visiting the area for work and  stumbled across it. So happy I did. Tasted exactly like I remember. One of the best pepperoni pizzas out there. Highly recommend.

Pizza was mid. We ordered the loaded fries and they brought us normal fries without the loaded. They also forgot our green onions and then took 20 min to bring it out. Then they didn't bring us our fixed loaded fries until we were finished eating 25 min later. And when they brought the "fixed" fries, they barely had any cheese on them. Not worth the 121 dollars spent. Super disappointed. How do you bring out loaded fries without the loaded?!

The pizza has a very good flavor, what happens when you order a medium and a large is something else, if you order a medium they cut you 2 slices less and if it is a large it is 2 slices more, what I am getting at with this is that between the pizza medium and the large there is no difference in size, in that sense they are robbing you off because it can cost you almost double.

My order was overcooked you can tell on the pictures that it was burnt. The meat was charred and did not taste good at all. Won‚Äôt be ordering from this location anymore, since we‚Äôve had problems with them before.

I didn‚Äôt bother calling because last time they messed up our order and promised we‚Äôd get free wings they didn‚Äôt deliver. We had placed an order for their 24 piece buffalo wings and got the plain instead, it was almost closing time so we were unable to go back to get them replaced. When we called the employee spoke to the manager which approved free wings next time we ordered and they promised to write our name down.

Well we called to place an order a week or 2 after they had messed up our older order hoping we could get what we were promised but when I explained the situation to the employee they placed us on hold so many times and finally when we spoke to a manger they said our name was not written down and said they could not give us the free wings because it was the 24 piece. We didn‚Äôt argue, and decided to not place an order that day.

They could really improve on their service because it‚Äôs definitely not it.

Overall this is a perfectly okay pizza establishment. Nothing particularly good or bad. Prices are typical for a pizza place. With no line in front of us our food took quite a bit longer than we expected.

We placed our order online through the app and were given a time for when the order would be ready. More than 10 minutes after the expected time we had to ask the cashier for an update. The food had been ready, but it wasn‚Äôt brought out to us and we had no notifications in the app or otherwise.

The place was clean so no complains there. We enjoyed dining in and watching a bit of the game while we ate our pizzas. The pizzas themselves were okay, but not great. I was a little disappointed in the cinnamon dessert pizza.

Push come to shove we‚Äôd eat here again, but it won‚Äôt be our go to pizza place while we spend time in Utah.

editorial_summary.overview: Casual pizza chain featuring traditional pies, gluten-free crust & assorted appetizers.

recentReviews.author: Alvaro Flores
recentReviews.text: The pizza has a very good flavor, what happens when you order a medium and a large is something else, if you order a medium they cut you 2 slices less and if it is a large it is 2 slices more, what I am getting at with this is that between the pizza medium and the large there is no difference in size, in that sense they are robbing you off because it can cost you almost double.

recentReviews.author: Mike Fuller
recentReviews.text: Haven't had mountain mikes since highschool out near Sacramento. I was visiting the area for work and  stumbled across it. So happy I did. Tasted exactly like I remember. One of the best pepperoni pizzas out there. Highly recommend.

recentReviews.author: Rory Stevens
recentReviews.text: Pizza was mid. We ordered the loaded fries and they brought us normal fries without the loaded. They also forgot our green onions and then took 20 min to bring it out. Then they didn't bring us our fixed loaded fries until we were finished eating 25 min later. And when they brought the "fixed" fries, they barely had any cheese on them. Not worth the 121 dollars spent. Super disappointed. How do you bring out loaded fries without the loaded?!

recentReviews.author: Ana Monroy
recentReviews.text:
My order was overcooked you can tell on the pictures that it was burnt. The meat was charred and did not taste good at all. Won‚Äôt be ordering from this location anymore, since we‚Äôve had problems with them before.

I didn‚Äôt bother calling because last time they messed up our order and promised we‚Äôd get free wings they didn‚Äôt deliver. We had placed an order for their 24 piece buffalo wings and got the plain instead, it was almost closing time so we were unable to go back to get them replaced. When we called the employee spoke to the manager which approved free wings next time we ordered and they promised to write our name down.

Well we called to place an order a week or 2 after they had messed up our older order hoping we could get what we were promised but when I explained the situation to the employee they placed us on hold so many times and finally when we spoke to a manger they said our name was not written down and said they could not give us the free wings because it was the 24 piece. We didn‚Äôt argue, and decided to not place an order that day.

They could really improve on their service because it‚Äôs definitely not it.

recentReviews.author: Double Decker Fam
recentReviews.text:
Overall this is a perfectly okay pizza establishment. Nothing particularly good or bad. Prices are typical for a pizza place. With no line in front of us our food took quite a bit longer than we expected.

We placed our order online through the app and were given a time for when the order would be ready. More than 10 minutes after the expected time we had to ask the cashier for an update. The food had been ready, but it wasn‚Äôt brought out to us and we had no notifications in the app or otherwise.

The place was clean so no complains there. We enjoyed dining in and watching a bit of the game while we ate our pizzas. The pizzas themselves were okay, but not great. I was a little disappointed in the cinnamon dessert pizza.

Push come to shove we‚Äôd eat here again, but it won‚Äôt be our go to pizza place while we spend time in Utah.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.0/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: "One of the best pepperoni pizzas out there" - social media marketing can showcase this strength
"Tasted exactly like I remember" - review management can highlight this positive aspect
"The place was clean so no complaints there" - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and lack of order updates - text messaging can bring customers back to your restaurant and build a loyal text club for promotions
Negative reviews and service issues - review management can address this concern
Poor differentiation and competition issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
